course_description: This course extends the principles of finance to the international context. Topics include exchange rate determination, the international monetary system, foreign exchange markets, currency futures, currency options, currency swaps, parity conditions, risk management, currency trading, and foreign investments.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the One-Year or Two-Year MBA program.
